queries.name: first errors
queries.description: Shows all Errors and TestSections to help identify where the test went wrong
queries.query: SELECT * FROM LogEntries WHERE level = 'ERROR' OR message LIKE 'TestSection:%' ORDER BY timestamp

queries.name: warnings and errors
queries.description: Shows all Errors, Warnings, and TestSections to provide more context about what went wrong
queries.query: SELECT * FROM LogEntries WHERE level IN ('ERROR', 'WARN') OR message LIKE 'TestSection:%' ORDER BY timestamp

queries.name: genesis only
queries.description: Limits the results to logs from the genesis pair only
queries.query: SELECT * FROM LogEntries WHERE pair = 'genesis' ORDER BY timestamp

queries.name: subsystem filter
queries.description: Filter logs by a specific subsystem to narrow down issues
queries.query: SELECT * FROM LogEntries WHERE subsystem = :subsystem ORDER BY timestamp
